ai-patthana16.27:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.27:1.1_0: for the result, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.27:1.1_1: for the result, not for the sake of teaching,
ai-patthana16.27:1.1_2: for the result, not for the sake of defining the Teaching, or for the sake of non-grasping.
ai-patthana16.27:1.1_3: because results in understanding that teaching, and not cause or conditioned by conditions.
ai-patthana16.27:1.1_4: For because it doesn’t cause or reason to give rise to the cause or reason, five things don’t arise, or if without a reason.
ai-patthana16.27:2.1_0: for the sake of investigating principles, without reason.
ai-patthana16.27:2.1_1: For the resultant teaching don’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of false teaching.
ai-patthana16.27:2.1_2: for the sake of investigating principles, and not for the sake of unprincipledity.
ai-patthana16.27:2.1_3: because of results in line with the teaching, and without cause or reason,
ai-patthana16.27:2.1_4: results in line with the teaching, not cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.27:3.1_0: Neither teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for teaching.
ai-patthana16.27:3.1_1: Neither teaching is not rooted in line with the teaching. It doesn’t give rise to cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.27:3.1_2: Neither have no cause or condition for the sake of unprincipled results. ...
ai-patthana16.27:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.27:5.1_0: for the result, not for the sake of teaching,
ai-patthana16.27:5.1_1: for the result of the teaching, not for the sake of worldly gain, not with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.27:5.1_2: results in the present, without cause, reason, or with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.27:6.1_0: results in line with the teaching, not cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.27:6.1_1: results in line with the teaching, not for the sake of natural principles, without reason.
ai-patthana16.27:6.1_2: results in line with the teaching, not cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.27:7.1_0: Neither in line with the teachings don’t give rise to confidence in those without it. It doesn’t give rise to cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana16.27:7.1_1: not cause or reason to teach Dhamma to the beginning of the Teaching ...
ai-patthana16.27:7.1_2: Neither have no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.27:8.1_0: results in the present life or in lives to come.
ai-patthana16.27:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
